attributes.action: Give us an extra Bank Holiday instead of swapping the Early May Bank Hol 2020.
attributes.additional_details:
Whilst I am all for marking this anniversary given that it is such a momentous occasion, why not offer the hard-working citizens of the UK an extra bank holiday to celebrate it seeing that as a nation we have some of the fewest number of bank holidays compared to other countries around the globe.

Therefore, this petition proposes for the Bank Holiday on Monday 4 May 2020 to remain, with an additional Bank Holiday to mark the VE anniversary on Friday 8 May 2020.
attributes.background: The Government have just announced that the 2020 Early May Bank Holiday will be moved from Monday 4 May 2020 to Friday 8 May 2020 to mark the 75th anniversary of VE Day.
